`CompositionLocal`s are implicit dependencies and creating new ones should be avoided. See https://slackhq.github.io/compose-lints/rules/#compositionlocals for more information.

The Compose Compiler cannot infer the stability of a parameter if a List<DiscussionUiModel> is used in it, even if the item type is stable. You should use Kotlinx Immutable Collections instead: `uiState: ImmutableList<DiscussionUiModel>` or create an `@Immutable` wrapper for this class: `@Immutable data class UiStateList(val items: List<DiscussionUiModel>)` See https://slackhq.github.io/compose-lints/rules/#avoid-using-unstable-collections for more information.
